text: Wales #COVID19 #Vaccine Tracker as at 13 April: 1,621,282 first doses given out. Increase of 18,343 in the past 24 hours. 64.3% of adults in Wales have had a first dose of a Covid-19 vaccine. 21.8% have had 2 doses - 549,193 adults. Increase of 11,998 in past 24 hours. https://t.co/dbu55QQDZY
